title: Zed new skins riot please :'c
body: Make a new zed skin pleeeaaassseeeeeee  :'c {{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Dude, champs like {{champion:154}} are the ones in need of a new skin, not {{champion:238}} ! 
He's already overplayed as it is...
Zac is not played as much as Zed however a new skin for him wouldn't be that bad i guess .-.
I'm not saying that Zed shouldn't have another skin, it's just that Riot is not focusing on champs with VERY minimal skins.

Zed is overplayed. I have nothing against Zeds being in my games than that. I just don't want another skin to come out for him right now because I already see plenty of games in normals with two Zeds. Another skin would just mean more people would be wanting to play Zed.
Zed isn't played that much especially in ranked he is banned anyway .-. What is so bad about having more people wanting to play Zed?  Can't you vs one?

> [{quoted}](name=phoenix28,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=QEbk7i6N,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-26T23:20:07.544+0000)
>
> Zed isn't played that much especially in ranked he is banned anyway .-. What is so bad about having more people wanting to play Zed?  Can't you vs one?

"I have nothing against Zeds being in my games than that."
If my problem was not knowing how to vs them, I would just learn his kit and tactics for fighting a Zed, because that's in my power to change.
Rito ain't listening to any zed players.

Like what? Arcade Zed?

I KNOW.

TRON ZED. And he throws Light Discs and his shadows/abilities have neon outlines.

guess it kinda sounds like Pax Sivir... but whatever.
Champions like ahri, annie and ashe are just way easier to make a skin for. Why? because they have a wider range of concepts and ideas. Zed is legit in every single game anyways.
